subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick won his second title in three weeks by rallying past Feliciano López of Spain, 6-7 (8), 6-4, 6-2, in the Dubai Tennis Championship final Saturday in the United Arab Emirates.
snippet: Andy Roddick won his second title in three weeks by rallying past Feliciano López of Spain, 6-7 (8), 6-4, 6-2, in the Dubai Tennis Championship final Saturday in the United Arab Emirates.
